<script type="text/javascript">
	//Import the required Dojo libraries
	dojo.registerModulePath("wc", "../_ver_r5956_ver_wc");

	dojo.require("wc.service.common");
	dojo.require("dojo.io.iframe");
	dojo.require("dojo.io.script");

	//Reloads widgets when parts of the page has been re-loaded from server
	dojo.require("dojo.parser");

	//Category menu support
	dojo.require("dijit.form.Button");
	dojo.require("wc.widget.WCMenu");
	dojo.require("wc.widget.WCDialog");
	dojo.require("dijit.layout.TabContainer");
	dojo.require("dijit.layout.ContentPane");
	dojo.require("dijit.Tooltip");
	dojo.require("dijit.TooltipDialog");
	dojo.require("dijit.popup");
	dojo.require("wc.widget.WCDropDownButton");
	dojo.require("dijit.Dialog");
	dojo.require("dojo.currency");
	dojo.require("dijit.Tree");
	dojo.require("dojo.back");
	dojo.require("dijit.form.DateTextBox");
	dojo.require("wc.widget.Tooltip");
	dojo.require("wc.widget.RefreshArea");
	dojo.require("wc.render.RefreshController");
	dojo.require("wc.render.Context");
	dojo.require("dojo.cookie");
	dojo.require("dojo.topic");
	dojo.require("dojo.date.locale");
	dojo.require("dojo.on");
	dojo.require("okey.widgets.OkeyCarousel");

	var loaders = [];    
    var absoluteURL = "https://www.okeydostavka.ru/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/";    
    var styleDirectoryPath = "images/colors/color1/";
    var supportPaymentTypePromotions = false;

    var subsFulfillmentFrequencyAttrName = "fulfillmentFrequency";
    var subsPaymentFrequencyAttrName = "paymentFrequency";
    var subsTimePeriodAttrName = "timePeriod";

    var storeNLS = null;
    var storeUserType = "G";
    var ios = false;
    var android = false;
    var multiSessionEnabled = true;

    // Store the amount of time of inactivity before a re-login is required, this value is retrieved from wc-server.xml, default is 30 mins
    var inactivityTimeout = 0;

    // Store the amount of time the inactivity warning dialog will be displayed before it closes itself, default is 20 seconds
    var inactivityWarningDialogDisplayTimer = 20000;

    // Store the amount of time to display a inactivity warning dialog before a re-login is required, default is 30 seconds
    var inactivityWarningDialogBuffer = 30000;

    // Store the timing event to display the inactivity dialog
    var inactivityTimeoutTracker = null;

    // Store the timing event to close the inactivity dialog
    var dialogTimeoutTracker = null;
    
    //Summary: Returns the path pointing to the directory containing color-dependant image files.
    //Description: In order to get the directory containing color-dependant image files in any javascript file, this function can be used.
    //Returns: The path to reference color-dependant image files.
    function getStyleDirectoryPath() {
        return styleDirectoryPath;
    }

    var viewportWidth = Math.min(window.screen.width, window.screen.height);

    var scale = viewportWidth / document.documentElement.clientWidth;
    scale = Math.floor(scale * 100) / 100;

    var FieldHelper = dojo.require("okey.utils.FieldHelper");
    var MessageHelper =  dojo.require("okey.utils.MessageHelper");
    var SystemHelper =  dojo.require("okey.utils.SystemHelper");        
	var gtm = dojo.require("okey.utils.GtmHelper");
    dojo.addOnLoad(function () {
    	 var lists = [];
        lists['GTM_LIST_CATALOG'] = 'Каталог';
        lists['GTM_LIST_RECOMENDATIONS'] = 'Рекомендации';
        lists['GTM_LIST_SEARCH'] = 'Поисковый запрос';
        lists['GTM_LIST_PATTERN'] = 'Шаблон';
        lists['GTM_LIST_CART'] = 'Корзина';
        lists['GTM_LIST_HISTORY'] = 'История заказов';
        gtm.init("RUB", "108", lists, "GTM-K79FP6");
        SystemHelper.setActionpayCookie();

        if (SystemHelper.isMobileAndTablet()) {
        	dojo.attr(dojo.body(), "data-wc-device", "mobile");
    	}
    });

    var out = '<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=' + scale + ', minimum-scale=' + scale + '">';
   	if (SystemHelper.isMobileAndTablet() && SystemHelper.checkNativeAndroid(navigator.userAgent)!=1)
   	{
       	document.write(out);
   	}


	 //Set the default NLS to use in the store.
    if (storeNLS == null) {
        dojo.requireLocalization("storetext", "StoreText");
        storeNLS = dojo.i18n.getLocalization("storetext", "StoreText");
    }

    var ie6 = false;
    var ie7 = false;
    if (navigator != null && navigator.userAgent != null) {
        ie6 = (navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf("msie 6.0") > -1);
        ie7 = (navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf("msie 7.0") > -1);
    }
    if (location.href.indexOf('UnsupportedBrowserErrorView') == -1 && (ie6 || ie7)) {
        document.write('<meta http-equiv="Refresh" content="0;URL="/>');
    }
    var isChrome = /Chrome/.test(navigator.userAgent) && /Google Inc/.test(navigator.vendor);
    var isSafari = /Safari/.test(navigator.userAgent) && /Apple Computer/.test(navigator.vendor);

    if (isChrome || isSafari)
    {
        var hiddenFields = dojo.query('input[type=\"hidden\"]');
        for (var i = 0; i < hiddenFields.length; i++)
        {
            hiddenFields[i].autocomplete = "off"
        }
    }
</script>

    	require(["okey/utils/BundleHelper",  "okey/modules/shopcart/CartOperations"], function(BundleHelper, cart)
        {         		                                     
        	BundleHelper.set("defaultPath","OKMarketSAS");

        		SystemHelper.checkAndroid().then(function(){
	        		MessageHelper.checkPageMessage({}).then(function(){
	        			cart.restoreSharedStatus();
						cart.restoreSharedCookies();			        						        			
						SystemHelper.executeLoaders();									
						
	        		})	
        		})							
			});
        })    
    });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

    dojo.addOnLoad(function () {
        var isOrderPage = false;
        var storeId = '10653';

        if (typeof(CheckoutHelperJS) !== 'undefined' && !isOrderPage && storeId != "") {
            CheckoutHelperJS.storeId = settings.storeId;
            CheckoutHelperJS.clearPaySubmitCookie();
        }
        hideURLbar();
    });
    require(["okey/modules/user/Header", "okey/utils/SystemHelper"], function (Header, SystemHelper) {
        var loader = function () {
            options = {
                isB2B: WCParamJS.isB2B,
                logonLogoutUrl: "/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/LogonForm?catalogId=12052&myAcctMain=1&langId=-20&storeId=10653",
                imagesPath: "/wcsstore/OKMarketSAS/",
                accountUrl: "/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/AjaxLogonForm?catalogId=12052&myAcctMain=1&langId=-20&storeId=10653",
                contractorProfileUrl: "/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/ContractorProfileForm?catalogId=12052&langId=-20&storeId=10653",
                historyUrl: '/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/TrackOrderStatus?orderStatusStyle=strong&catalogId=12052&langId=-20&storeId=10653',
                wishlistUrl: "javascript:redirectToSignOn('/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/WishListDisplayView?pageSize=20&catalogId=12052&langId=-20&listId=.&storeId=10653');",
                billingUrl: "/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/OrderShippingBillingView?catalogId=12052&langId=-20&storeId=10653&purchaseorder_id=",
                storeSelectionTimeout: 720,
                isDebug: false, 
                
                    addressBookUrl: '/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/AddressBookForm?catalogId=12052&langId=-20&storeId=10653'
                
            };
            var header = new Header(options);
            header.update();
        };
        SystemHelper.addLoader(loader);
    });

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">    
        require(["okey/modules/shopcart/MiniShoppingCart", "okey/utils/SystemHelper"], function(MiniShoppingCart, SystemHelper) {
           var loader = function() {
                var settings = {                 	                   
                    storeId: 10653,                    
                    cartContentsElementId: "MiniShoppingCartContents",
                    totalElementId: "miniShopCartTotal",
                    countElementId: "miniShopCartSum",
                    stickerTotalElementId: "miniShopCartStickerTotal",
                    popupElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded",
                    qtyUomElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded_qtyUom",
                    qtyElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded_qty",
                    qtyTitleElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded_qtyTitle",
                    priceElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded_price",
                    priceTotalElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded_orderTotal",
                    titleElementId: "MiniShopCartAddedProdImg_Title",
                    nameAndUrlElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded_NameAndUrl",
                    imageElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded_Image",

                    stickerInfoElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded_stickerInfo",
                    specialPriceStickerElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded_specialPriceSticker",
                    stickerQuantityElementId: "MiniShopCartProductAdded_stickerQuantity",

                    rootServerAddress: dojo.byId("MiniShoppingCart_rootServerAddressValue").innerHTML,
                    imageNoImage: dojo.byId("MiniShopCartProductAdded_NoImageHidden").innerHTML,
                    isDebug: false
                };

                var miniCart = new MiniShoppingCart(settings);
                if (!SystemHelper.checkCurrentPageByCodes("shopcart"))
                	miniCart.load();
            };
            SystemHelper.addLoader(loader);
        });
</script>
                    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
	
		SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.addSlider(13.79, 399.0, 'price', 0);
	

	require(["dojo/on"], function(on) {
		on(document, "a.facetbutton:click", function(event) {
			var checkbox = document.getElementById(this.getAttribute("data-for"));
			checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked;
			if (this.getAttribute("role") == "checkbox") {
				this.setAttribute("aria-checked", checkbox.checked);
			}
			checkbox.onclick();
			event.preventDefault();
	   });
	});

	var _searchBasedNavigationFacetContext = new Array();

	

	require(["dojo/domReady!"], function(){
		setTimeout("SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.restoreHistoryContext();", 200);
	});


	window.onpopstate = function(event) {
		setTimeout("SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.restoreHistoryContext();", 200);
	};

</script>

	if (location.href.indexOf("#facet")<0)
		dojo.publish("gtm/impressionsData");

<span class="spanacce" id="searchBasedNavigation_widget_ACCE_Label"  aria-hidden="true">Список товаров</span>
<div dojoType="wc.widget.RefreshArea" widgetId="searchBasedNavigation_widget_6_-1011_3074457345618259713" id="searchBasedNavigation_widget_6_-1011_3074457345618259713" objectId="_6_-1011_3074457345618259713" controllerId="searchBasedNavigation_controller_6_-1011_3074457345618259713" ariaMessage="Окно списка продуктов обновлено" ariaLiveId="ariaMessage" role="region" aria-labelledby="searchBasedNavigation_widget_ACCE_Label">
	
<!-- Begin CatalogEntryList_UI.jspf -->

	<div class="productListingWidget">		
		<script>			
			dojo.addOnLoad(function(){
				dojo.topic.subscribe("Facet_Add", function(){					
					SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.appendFilterFacet(arguments[0]);	
					SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.doSearchFilter();
				});
				dojo.topic.subscribe("Facet_Add_Range", function(){
					SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.appendFilterRange(arguments[0]);
					SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.doSearchFilter();
				});
				dojo.topic.subscribe("Facet_Remove", function(){				
						SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.removeFilterFacet(arguments[0]);
						SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.doSearchFilter();																
				});
				dojo.topic.subscribe("Facet_Remove_Range", function(){					
						SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.removeFilterRange(arguments[0]);
						SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.doSearchFilter();					
				});
				dojo.topic.subscribe("Facet_RemoveAll", function(){
					SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS.clearAllFacets(true);
				});				
			});
		</script>		
									
		<section class="top-line">
			
			<script>
				dojo.addOnLoad(function(){
					dojo.subscribe("showResultsForPageNumber",SearchBasedNavigationDisplayJS,"showResultsPage");

<script type="text/javascript">
	dojo.addOnLoad(function() { 
		//Make sure page is loaded at this point
		//Set requestedSubmitted to false
		cursor_clear();

		// All div's whose id attribute contains dojoWidget subString -- dojo.query('div[id*="dojoWidget"]')
		// All div's which contains dojoType attribute -- dojo.query(div[dojoType])
		dojo.query('div[dojoType]').forEach(function(node, index, arr){
			addToWidgetsList(node.id);
		});
		parseAllWidgets();
	}); 	
</script><!-- END Footer.jsp -->
